    • About Andrew Lamb


    As a husband and father of three beautiful little girls, Andrew Lamb understands how important it is to live in a safe and vibrant community. Andrew and his team, The Lamb Team, have become one of the preeminent real estate teams in Solano County. They help dozens of families buy and sell real estate throughout Northern California every year. Andrew’s commitment to his clients and business has earned him recognition as one of the most innovative leaders in real estate.

    Andrew has built an organization dedicated to assisting clients with every aspect of the transaction. For the price of one real estate agent, Andrew’s clients have access to individual experts in buying, selling, marketing, customer service, negotiations, and contract handling. Andrew’s innovative approach to sales and marketing has garnered attention from real estate agents all over the United States. With systems like their “Guaranteed Sale Program”, “Certified Home”, and “151 Point Marketing Plan”, The Lamb Team can put up to 18% more money in your pocket than traditional real estate methods. Let them put those systems to work for you today.
